00007 typedef short unsigned Sharype ;
00008 
00009 #pragma mark * Sharype definitions
00010 
00011 // Since simple integers take up the same number of bytes as a pointer,
00012 // and since it can be painful to maintain synchronization between the
00013 // extern declarations in the .h file and the assignments in the .m
00014 // file, I use #define for integer constants.  Actually, it's more efficient
00015 // since I don't need the definition for each value -- A constant used
00016 // in N places takes up only N integer-sized chunks instead of N+1.
00017 
00018 // Keywords in definitions denote the hierarchical place:
00019 //    General      -- very coarse
00020 //    Coarse       -- coarse
00021 //    [not noted]  -- fine
00022 
00023 #define SharypeAll               0xffff
00024 #define SharypeModelDefault      0x0def // Note 1
00025 #define SharypeUndefined         0x0000  
00026 
00027 #define SharypeGeneralContainer  0x00ff
00028 
00029 #define SharypeCoarseHartainer     0x000f
00030 #define SharypeRoot                      0x0001 
00031 #define SharypeBar                       0x0002
00032 #define SharypeMenu                      0x0004
00033 #define SharypeUnfiled           0x0008
00034 #define SharypeOhared            0x000a
00035 
00036 #define SharypeCoarseSoftainer   0x00f0
00037 #define SharypeSoftFolder        0x0010
00038 
00039 #define SharypeCoarseLeaf        0x0f00
00040 #define SharypeBookmark          0x0100
00041 #define SharypeLiveRSS           0x0200
00042 #define SharypeRSSArticle        0x0300 // See note 2.
00043 #define SharypeSmart             0x0400
00044 #define Sharype1Password         0x0800  
00045 
00046 #define SharypeCoarseNotch       0xf000
00047 #define SharypeSeparator         0x1000
00048 
00049 // Note 1.  This is the default value for a stark's starype in the data model.
00050 //        If you ever see one of these, there's a bug somewhere.
00051 
00052 // Note 2.  Never appears in a Bookshelf moc.  Used only temporarily in Extore mocs, 
00053 //        In reading, only until we setRssArticlesFromAndRemoveStarks:
00054 //        In writing, only after restoreRssArticlesInsertAsChildStarks
00055
